title: Cara Delevingne keeps head down as she leaves Nasty Gal bash with Ashley Benson
text:
Cara Delevingne and Ashley Benson kept their heads down after the party (Picture: Backgrid)

Cara Delevingne kept her head down as she made her way out of her Nasty Gal launch party, alongside girlfriend Ashley Benson.

The model was spotted attempting to go unnoticed while leaving the swanky bash, held at The Box in Soho, with the Pretty Little Liars actress by her side.

Side note: She still managed to look fresh as a daisy after partying the night away, and we are desperate for her secrets.

The 27-year-old rocked a tailored grey checked blazer with matching trousers, finishing the look off with a plain white crop top.

While Ashley, 29, opted for a black, lacy cropped corset and distressed jeans for the evening, accessorising simply with a black shoulder bag.

She was every inch the proud girlfriend as she joined the model at her launch, alongside a string of famous faces, including Lottie Moss, Nick Grimshaw and Louisa Johnson.

Cara still managed to look fresh after partying the night away (Picture: Backgrid)

Cara and Ashley couldn’t keep their hands off each other all night (Picture: Backgrid)

And, after they were seen having a quick kiss in the DJ booth on stage, an insider told Metro.co.uk: ‘Cara didn’t leave Ashley’s side even though it was her night.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘She made sure Ashley was with her the whole time.’

They seemed ‘totally loved up’ on the night out (Picture: Splash)

‘They seem totally loved up, they only have eyes for each other.’

Cashley are thought to have been dating for over a year, but have kept much of their romance largely out of the spotlight.

Cara launched her Nasty Gal collection at The Box (Picture: Backgrid)

Ashley was every inch the proud girlfriend (Picture: Getty)

However, Kendall Jenner’s pal recently lifted the lid on how they manage to make things work, despite both having very busy schedules.

‘Long-distance relationships are always tough. We make it work though. We have to. And it definitely makes me a better, happier person,’ she said in an interview.

‘I’d never truly let anyone in before, for fear of them leaving.

‘I never really trusted people, or felt worthy of it, and I always pushed them away. She’s the first person that has said: “You can’t push me away. I’m going to be nice to you, I love you.” I’m just like, “Wait, so all I have to do is just let you be nice to me? Why have I never done that before? Okay.”‘

Honestly couple goals.

Got a showbiz story? If you've got a story, video or pictures get in touch with the Metro.co.uk Entertainment team by emailing us celebtips@metro.co.uk, calling 020 3615 2145 or by visiting our Submit Stuff page - we'd love to hear from you.

description: Cara Delevingne kept her head down as she made her way out of her Nasty Gal launch party, alongside girlfriend Ashley Benson.
